Key: Uh, so where were we heading again?
Hey, Shin.
Oh. Reine-sensei... What are you doing here?

...What do you mean by that, Shin? I came to pick
you up.

Pick me up... Reine-sensei, aren't you in charge
of the girls' health checkups?

...That was the plan, but something came up, so I
have to leave soon. I'll leave the rest to you,
Shin.
Huh...? Leave it to me?

...It's mostly done, but... There was one girl who
was late. I still have her left.

I don't really get what's happening, but... don't
tell me... I have to do the health checkup...?
...Of course you do.
What?! But why me?

...Isn't it obvious? That's what assistants do,
Shin.

...Excuse me? O-Oh, my God... you're right! I'm
wearing a lab coat!

...You can't escape your responsibilities, Shin.
You have to do your work.
I see... So I'm a doctor...
Well then, I'm leaving the rest to you...
Hey... Reine-sensei!
...And she's gone.
I wonder who missed their checkup...
I guess I have no choice but to go...
So, I'm going to do the physical here...
A... physical... for a girl...

(No, no. I'm a doctor. I shouldn't have any
ulterior motives.)
Stay calm. Stay calm.
Sorry for the wait!
Wh-Whoa! Tohka?!

Ohhh, Shido! Are you going to do my physical?
That's amazing! I'll be counting on you.

Then that means... you're the student that was
late?

Yeah! I was waiting at the school because I
thought they'd be testing how fast we could
run or throw a ball, but no one came.
Why didn't anyone tell her?!
(If no one noticed, I wonder who set this up.)
Well, what I'm going to do is examine your body.

(Ngh... Calm down. Calm down, Shido! Be cool, be
cool...!)
Hey, Shido? What do you examine in a physical?

W-Well... I'll be measuring your height and your
weight. It's not a big deal. There's nothing
suspicious about it.

Oh, is that all? Let's hurry up and finish it,
then.
R-Right. Let's get this over with.

O-Okay. So we've finished measuring your height
and weight. Umm... so your height is 155 cm, and
your weight is...
Hey, wait a minute, Shido.
Hm? What is it?

You're not supposed to expose a girl's weight...
That is an expectation upheld by society.

Oh, I see... You're right. I don't know who told
you that, but I guess I shouldn't be saying it
out loud, huh?
Yeah! Shido, you're amazing!

I don't about that... but I'll be quiet while
I write it down.
So, what are you going to measure next? My grip?
Ngh... Hm. Well, what's next is, um...

What's the matter, Shido? Are you not able to read
what's on the paper?
No... Of course that's not it!
Hehe. It happens to me all the time.

Don't be proud of that... Well... what I have to
do is take your measurements.

M-Measurements? Are you talking about... those
areas?
Y-Yeah. I am...
Bust, waist, hips.
Physical aptitude, intelligence, agility.
Regular, large, extra large.

I'm talking about your bust, waist, and hip
measurements.

I-I see. I know about that. I've done it before.
B-But... it's my first time... having you measure
me.

Y-Yeah... S-So, I'm going to have to... at least
touch... your body a little.
You're... going to touch me?

Y-Yeah. You have problem with it, huh? If you
don't want me to, I can ask someone else to
do it...
I-I don't... mind.
R-Really...?

B-But... it is a physical. So... you're not doing
it with ulterior motives, right? I don't want
you... to get the wrong idea.
No, that's... That's not it...

A-Anyways... if it's you, I don't mind! So long as
it's you, Shido... I, um... don't mind if you
do... anything...
Oh... Okay. Th-Then let's get started.

I'm talking about physical aptitude, intelligence,
and agility.

Wh-What? I understand the physical part and maybe
agility... but intelligence...? Wh-What's that?
Ah... that'll be 32.

What?! You're writing it down already?! But you
didn't even measure anything.

That was just a joke. I need to measure
your figure.

Y-Yeah. You're talking about bust, waist, and
hips, right? But I've already done that before.

These are things we measure periodically. It could
have changed, you know?

I-Is that so? I'm not a rubber doll. I don't think
I'll grow or shrink all the time.

(It's true. No matter how much Tohka eats, her
figure doesn't change. If other girls heard that,
they might get jealous.)

D-Don't tell me, Shido... That you're saying that
only because you want to touch me.

O-Of course not. I'm a doctor. Th-This is
necessary for your health.
I see. You are a doctor. I trust you.

O-Okay, leave it to me. Anyways, let's
get measuring.

I'm talking about regular, large, or extra large.
What do you want, Tohka?

Wh-What? I can only choose one?
That's troublesome...
I'm fine with regular.

Ngh... fine, I guess I'll be happy with an extra
large. It better come with miso soup.

Yeah, it usually does... What are you talking
about?! That's not it! I'm talking about your
figure! Your figure! Bust, waist, and hips!
What?! So, no miso soup?!

No! How long would you have gone along with that,
Tohka...? Let's hurry up and get your
measurements.
Huh? Wait, you're not talking about food?

I'm talking about your physical. I was just
kidding earlier.

I see. It was a joke... But... grr... now that you
bring it up, I'm getting hungry.

Oh... Well, I'm sorry about that. How's this...
I will buy you a beef bowl on our way back.

Ohh, a beef bowl! That would be nice! All right,
let's hurry and finish this.
...There's something you need to do before that.
What are you doing? Why did you stand up?
Oh, I forgot to check you with the stethoscope...
Oh, then let's do that first.

Come to think of it, if I do it from the front, it
would be kinda embarrassing... Can it be from the
back?
That's fine! You're a doctor. I trust you!
Y-Yeah. Okay. I am a doctor, after all.
Yeah!
(But that isn't a good enough reason.)
It's just... Are you okay with that, Tohka?
Huh? I don't mind at all.
I-I see... Then...
I-Is this it...?
...Hah...mmm...
H-Hey... don't make weird noises.
S-Sorry. I was surprised.

R-Right. I see. Sorry about that. Well... this
is... *grunt*...
(I'm totally... touching Tohka's body.)

(Tohka's warmth, my hand grazing her skin... and I
can feel her soft hair... there's the scent of
soap...!)
(Oh, no... I'm feeling dizzy.)

What's the matter, Shido? You're not going to
measure me?
Yeah, I will. I-I'll do it now.

Y-You're breathing very heavily, Shido.
Are you sick?
N-No... It's nothing.

(Oh, no... I guess my excitement was obvious from
my breathing. I should hurry through this as
quickly as possible.)
O-Okay, Tohka. Let's get this over with.
B-Bring it on!
Haah... Kyaaa.

*Grunt*... Don't move, Tohka. I can't measure you
like this.
*Whimper*... I-It tickles. It tickles, Shido!
I'll be done quick. Hang in there...
Ah... Ahh... Mmm.
D-Don't twist your body...
Un...mm... Ah... Ahhhh.
Ah...ahhh...mm... Ah...
Sh-Shido. My body is getting hot...
Don't move! I can't hear!
N-No...! I-If you touch me there...

Tohka, calm down! This is a physical. Don't make
noises or move...
Excuse me.
Is the physical over?
I've come to help you clean up.
...Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh?!

...*pant*... *pant*... Shido... I-I can't... take
it anymore...

Itsuka-sensei! Wh-Wh-Wh-Wh-Wh-What are you
doing?! T-T-T-T-To our student?! Ahhh! This is
inappropriate!
N-No! It's not like that!
PERVERT! PERRRRVERT IN THE BUILDING! SOMEONE!
What... pervert? Who is she talking about?
C-Crap! Aaaaaaggghhhhh!
